metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25863 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.6, 3.0.0 to 3.0.13, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.20, the MIME Multipart dissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-multipart.c by correcting the deallocation of invalid MIME parts.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.2.7-1
libwireshark15 - 3.2.7-1
libwiretap12 - 3.2.7-1
libwsutil13 - 3.2.7-1
tshark - 3.2.7-1
wireshark - 3.2.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.2.7-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.2.7-1
wireshark-qt - 3.2.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-1').
